title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Critically acclaimed with an 87 Metacritic score and 8.1 IMDb rating from over 76,000 votes. It's helmed by renowned creator Vince Gilligan (Breaking Bad) and streams on prestigious Apple TV.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: This HBO drama boasts an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45,000 votes and a 77 Metacritic score. It features Oscar-nominated Mark Ruffalo and is created by Brad Ingelsby, known for the hit 'Mare of Easttown'.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, amid a spate of unexplained disappearances of local children, a group of misfit friends begin to suspect a long-buried ancient evil lurking. As the kids set out to determine what's really going on, a rising unease prompts several townspeople to work together to restore peace – all while a U.S. military operation seeks to exploit Derry for its own objectives.
reason: A highly anticipated HBO prequel to the popular 'IT' franchise, it has garnered an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 71,000 votes. The series is executive produced by the Muschietti siblings, who directed the successful 'IT' films.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: This Netflix series attracts viewers with an ensemble led by Emmy-winner Jason Bateman and Oscar-nominee Jude Law, achieving a 7.4 IMDb rating from over 35,000 votes.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.
reason: A Netflix drama with a strong 7.9 IMDb rating from over 22,000 votes, featuring Oscar-nominated actress Vera Farmiga.
